profile.introduction_content: A Full-Stack and DevOps developer with experience in a variety of technologies, from C# and TypeScript to Python and Java. Specializing in building scalable and secure web applications, I enjoy integrating front-end and back-end with clean architecture while managing CI/CD pipelines and cloud infrastructure. Always seeking new challenges and learning opportunities, I am excited to explore areas such as Information Security, IoT, ML, and Mobile development.
